author: alaperto
body: #### PR description: Development of Phase2 DQM, main focus on C-RACK. PositionOfClusters "2S Module" and "2S Ladder" plots: - Rename to include the number of Layer, Ladder and Module into title (avoid confusion) - Restrict these plots to Barrel (dedicated to C-RACK, avoid "2S Module" plots for Endcap) - Bug fixes (i.e. modules in positive Z with positive index on "2S Ladder" plot) Moreover: - New plot: Cluster per Barrel Layer - Uniform several OTDigi and OTCluster plots (title, name, axes, [cm], ...) with other Phase2 Tracker DQM plots - Dedicated /test .py files for C-RACK (no validation step, no Inner Tracker) #### PR validation: Tested on C-RACK MC: output [DQM.root file](https://cernbox.cern.ch/s/ykK1tQj8609QE11)
title: C-RACK Phase2 DQM
